name: All Purpose Seasoning
description: A versatile, salt-free seasoning blend for meats and savory dishes like saut√©ed vegetables. Keeping salt separate allows better control of seasoning, especially in dishes that already contain salty ingredients.
gist: Equal parts smoked paprika, garlic powder, and onion powder, with half a part black pepper.
ingredients:
- 1 part smoked paprika
- 1 part garlic powder
- 1 part onion powder
- 1/2 part black pepper
steps:
1. Combine all ingredients.
2. Optionally, add half part cayenne or chili powder for more spice, or half part any dried herbs like oregano or thyme.
